question: Diwan Mani Ram Datta was a leader of revolutionaries of 1857 in which among the following regions?
explanation: Diwan Mani Ram Datta or Maniram Dutta Baruah, popularly called Kalita Raja, was an Assamese nobleman and one of the pioneers of the tea gardens in Assam. He was a loyal ally of East India Company but then was hanged by the British for conspiring against them during the 1857 uprising.
